statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'active';
SELECT blogger_id, brand_id FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE event_id = 123;
SELECT brand_id, partnership_status FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE blogger_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE brand_id = 789;
SELECT blogger_id, partnership_status FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE event_id = 456;
SELECT blogger_id, brand_id, event_id, partnership_status FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'approved' ORDER BY blogger_id DESC
SELECT brand_id, blogger_id, event_id FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'pending' ORDER BY brand_id ASC
SELECT * FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE blogger_id = 101 AND brand_id = 201 AND partnership_status = 'rejected'
SELECT blogger_id, brand_id FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'approved' AND blogger_id IN (101, 102, 103)
SELECT * FROM fashion_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'pending' AND event_id = 301 ORDER BY blogger_id ASC, brand_id DESC
SELECT * FROM bloggers;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM bloggers WHERE blogger_location = 'USA';
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_location FROM bloggers WHERE blogger_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM brands ORDER BY brand_country DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brands WHERE brand_country = 'France';
SELECT * FROM bloggers WHERE blogger_location = 'New York';
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM bloggers WHERE blogger_location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM brands WHERE brand_country = 'USA' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brands WHERE brand_country = 'Canada' AND brand_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email, blogger_location FROM bloggers WHERE blogger_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM fashion_bloggers;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM fashion_bloggers;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_followers FROM fashion_bloggers ORDER BY blogger_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM brands WHERE brand_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT brand_name, brand_representative FROM brands;
SELECT * FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE blogger_followers > 5000;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE blogger_followers BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brands ORDER BY brand_category, brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email, blogger_followers FROM fashion_bloggers INNER JOIN brands ON fashion_bloggers.blogger_id = brands.brand_id WHERE blogger_followers > 5000;
SELECT * FROM fashion_bloggers;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM fashion_bloggers ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category, country FROM brands WHERE country='USA';
SELECT event_name, location FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT blogger_name, brand_name, event_name FROM fashion_bloggers JOIN partnerships ON fashion_bloggers.blogger_id = partnerships.blogger_id JOIN brands ON partnerships.brand_id = brands.brand_id JOIN fashion_events ON partnerships.event_id = fashion_events.event_id ORDER BY blogger_name ASC, brand_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE blogger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT brand_name, country FROM brands WHERE brand_category = 'Apparel';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT blogger_name, brand_name, partnership_status FROM fashion_bloggers fb JOIN partnerships p ON fb.blogger_id = p.blogger_id JOIN brands b ON p.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE partnership_status = 'Active';
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_email FROM fashion_bloggers;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brands ORDER BY brand_category ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_city FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE blogger_city = 'New York';
SELECT blogger_name, brand_name, partnership_status FROM blogger_brands JOIN brands ON blogger_brands.brand_id = brands.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM fashion_bloggers;
SELECT blogger_id, blogger_name FROM fashion_bloggers ORDER BY blogger_name DESC;
SELECT blogger_name, blogger_city FROM fashion_bloggers WHERE blogger_city = 'New York';
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brands WHERE brand_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY brand_name;
SELECT blogger_name, event_name, partnership_status FROM fashion_bloggers JOIN blogger_events ON fashion_bloggers.blogger_id = blogger_events.blogger_id WHERE partnership_status = 'Confirmed';
